title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: Jean Michael Seri linked
description: All the latest Man Utd transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Thursday, January 25.
content: Manchester United and Manchester City will go head to head again, this time trying to force a transfer for Nice midfielder Jean Michael Seri over the line, according to the Daily Express.Meanwhile, the two Manchester clubs will battle for another midfielder with United considering making a move for Shakhtar Donetsk midfielder Fred, according to the Daily Star.Le 10 Sport report Real Madrid star Mateo Kovacic has been identified by Jose Mourinho as a potential replacement for Michael Carrick.And finally, Aston Villa are poised to complete the signing of Axel Tuanzebe on loan from United, reports the Express and Star.
